dialogue: Wally, I'm sending you to a conference for the world's top engineers.
With any luck, one of our competitors will try to poach you.
That will save me the trouble of firing you.
You'll be going with five other people I want to get rid of.
I took the liberty of updating your résumé.
If this goes as planned, you'll destroy one of our competitors from within, like a hideous disease.
It was the first time I ever felt useful.
